thread.title: Ck1Mia
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by Ck1Mia

author: Ck1Mia
title: Ck1Mia
text: Great company to deal with as they delivered on what was promised online for me as a selling customer! But... the only mishap would be that, they need to change the way they advertise their T.V Ad, saying that we as buyers will buy any old mobile phones, when in this case, once going online to sell your unwanted phone, it can only be of a Samsung, I-Phone or a Tablet and not any other phone brand as they are worthless. But that's just my opinionðŸ˜‰ Thankyou Mazuma!!
